Ensure that change.boundingClientRect matches change.target.getBoundingClientRect() for a clipped element with overflow inside an iframe.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS entries.length is 1
PASS entries[0].boundingClientRect.top is target.getBoundingClientRect().top
PASS entries[0].boundingClientRect.left is target.getBoundingClientRect().left
PASS entries[0].boundingClientRect.width is target.getBoundingClientRect().width
PASS entries[0].boundingClientRect.height is target.getBoundingClientRect().height
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
